discourse_list.title: OG Council: NFT protocols and usecases

content.content: Hey everyone, here is a summary of what we did in the workshop at the OG Council. I consider this a part 1 and hope to do a part 2 answering some of these questions or providing more detail on these topics at a future event. Here are the compiled notes on questions, use cases and protocols we discussed. Feel free to add more. Questions  How can we ensure new use cases of NFTs remain truly decentralized How can we use Defi integration for NFT governence tokens How can insurance contracts be tradable (similar to oracle based payouts) Where are my NFTs stored? Copyrights - What are the laws around music, film, books and storylines? How can we market and promote NFTs in Web3  Use cases  Composable remixable NFTs CUPPA.CC decentralized onbourding USAIC POAP chains TCR Harberger Tax Medical Data (MRI, DTI, ASL) Linlock Identity and personal information (eg. Medical use) Real estate Membership Certificates and education Licences Game items Certificates of authenticity Intellectual Properties (IPs) Ticketing Art trading Bills of lauding Voting Vouchers (NFT burn mechanic) Film, book and music rights (nfts)  Protocols  Near Protocol NFT X Climate kitties POAP Royalty Register DAO Lens Protocol Hedgey Wolf Game (NFT game) Crypto Raiders (NFT Game) Aaveagotchi (NFT game) Soulbound NFTs (non tradable tokens)
Thank you for posting the summary!
